Items.Title: Oversight - Speed Cameras
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, (1) S.6046/A.7798, which would authorize the expanded use of speed cameras in New York City, (2) legislation that would provide for the escalation of penalties and consequences for multiple violations issued by red light and speed cameras and (3) legislation that would require physicians to report medical conditions or incidents that indicate a driver is at high risk of suddenly losing consciousness or vehicle control.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Authorize the expanded use of speed cameras in NYC ( S.6046/A.7798)

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending:  Speaker Johnson, Lander, Gjonaj, Ampry-Samuel

Items.Title: Oversight - Speed Cameras
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
